```{r}
library(p8105.datasets)
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(plotly)

```

```{r}
data(instacart)
```

```{r}
instacart %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  filter(order_hour_of_day < 12 | order_hour_of_day > 6) %>% 
  count(add_to_cart_order) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  mutate(product_name = fct_reorder(product_name, n)) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~product_name, y = ~n, color =~product_name, type = "bar")

  
```
